attributes.action: make the wearing of "tin foil hats" mandatory for all schoolchildren untill the dangers of WIFI have been fuly investigated
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: given the current worries about WIFI networks on health is it not better to be safe with tinfoil than sorry with our childrens health?

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
